inclusion.criterion: CR with ≤2 courses of induction chemotherapy.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Out of the hospital for a minimum of 4 weeks from induction chemotherapy or 3 weeks if consolidation chemotherapy has been administered.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Remission bone marrow bx w/i 2 wks of beginning post remission rx.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: One cycle of post-remission consolidation w/standard dose cytarabine or HDAC with <8 doses of HDAC.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Benign CSF: Lumbar puncture with cell count, differential and protein to determine lack of extramedullary leukemia required w/i 2 weeks of post- remission therapy IF CSF status is unknown or has been positive at dx.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No evidence of prior liver disease.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate pulmonary function with DLCO ≥40% of predicted.
inclusion.label: unknown
